creator: mwpage@xs4all.nl
text:
After Apache v2.0.36, PHP does not work! There are no error's reported in the 
Apache or PHP error logs.
Apache does not start.
When removing the "LoadModule php4_module C:/progra~1/php/sapi/php4apache2.dll" 
line Apache starts correctly (without PHP of course).
I can not determ or this is an Apache or PHP bug (made in PHP and Apache an bug 
report).
Apache v2.0.36 and PHP v4.2.1 does work correctly. when upgraden to a newer 
version og Apache or PHP (or both) it does not work :(

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
If Apache works correctly without PHP but not with PHP, you most likely have a PHP
problem.  Your problem could be that you need to download the most recent PHP in
order to work with the most recent version of Apache.  In any case, please
try addressing your problem on the PHP users or install mailing list.  If you
can confirm you have found a bug, please address it to the PHP bug database.
